DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate relationship postoperative fluid balance , inflammation acute kidney injury . This non-interventional study ( drug administration ) . The investigator collect baseline demographic data , postoperative fluid balance status Intake-output data , follow routine lab collect 1 blood sample ( 0.5ml ) morning lab draw day 1 5ml urine sample day 1 2 .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old , Undergoing elective cardiothoracic surgery ( ) , alone combination procedures/surgery ( ) : thoracic aortic aneurysm , cardiac valve , coronary artery bypass grafting , abdominal thoracic aneurysm , cardiovascular surgery . Pregnancy History organ transplant Preoperative intraaortic balloon pump ( IABP ) Current use natriuretic peptide ESRD patient dialysis Estimated GFR < 30ml/min use MDRD equation .
